tool.name: SCEasy convert
tool.command:
#if str($conversion['direction']).startswith("loom") ln -s ${conversion.input_object_file} input.loom && #else if str($conversion['direction']).startswith("anndata") ln -s ${conversion.input_object_file} input.h5ad && #else ln -s ${conversion.input_object_file} input.rds && #end if
Rscript -e 'library(sceasy)' #if $conversion.direction == "loom2sce" -e 'sce <- sceasy::convertFormat("input.loom", from="loom", to="sce", main_layer_name="${conversion.assay_name}")' -e 'saveRDS(sce, "output.rds")' -e 'print(sce)' #else if $conversion.direction == "sce2loom" -e 'sce <- readRDS("input.rds")' -e 'sceasy::convertFormat(sce, outFile="output.loom", from="sce", to="loom", main_layer="${conversion.assay}")' #else if $conversion.direction == "sce2anndata" -e 'sce <- readRDS("input.rds")' -e 'sceasy::convertFormat(sce, outFile="output.h5ad", from="sce", to="anndata", main_layer="${conversion.assay}")' -e 'print(sce)' #else if $conversion.direction == "seurat2anndata" -e 'srt <- readRDS("input.rds")' -e 'sceasy::convertFormat(srt, outFile="output.h5ad", from="seurat", to="anndata", assay="${conversion.assay}", main_layer="${conversion.dtype}")' -e 'print(srt)' #end if

param.name: assay_name
param.label: Name of the expression matrix to be transferred as

param.name: input_object_file
param.label: Input object in SingleCellExperiment RDS format

param.name: assay
param.label: Name of the assay to be transferred as main layer
param.help: Please make sure the assay exists

param.name: input_object_file
param.label: Input object in SingleCellExperiment RDS format

param.name: assay
param.label: Name of the assay to be transferred as main layer
param.help: Please make sure the assay exists

param.name: input_object_file
param.label: Input object in Seurat RDS format

param.name: assay
param.label: Name of the assay to be transferred
param.help: Please make sure the assay exists

param.name: dtype
param.label: Data type of the assay to be transferred
param.help: Please make sure the data type exists
